arrangement.head: COLLECTION ARRANGEMENT
arrangement.p: This forms a portion of collection #5488 B. The guide to the entire collection is available here.
Series LXXXII is arranged in 49 sub-series by Union file number.

did.unittitle: General. National Conference of State Legislative Chairmen
General. Uniform Per Capita Tax Report
Box No. 590 does not exist or is missing.
